name: Slayer of Darkness RPG
description: A rpg style game where you play as a rouge that mysteriously wakes up in a dungeon and must venture through all the dungeons the dungeon master has created. The dungeon master  has been watching this child ever since 10 years ago, when he was born. Ever since his parents found out the dungeon master was trying to kill him, they ran far away, where they trained him up to this point. But soon after the the dungeon master found him once more, his parents were killed  and the rouge managed to run away. Soon after he blacked out from exhaustion and woke up in the mysterious dungeon.  Now the dungeon master is trying everything in his power to kill the rouge by setting up random dungeon to try to the kill the rouge for good. Are you ready to  play as the rouge and venture through these dungeons and eventually find, defeat , and get rid of the dungeon master for good?
